T02D1750:135a-1: padma dz'a lodbha ba s'a dha ni /
T02D1750:135a-3: padma dra ba 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1750:135a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1750:135a-5: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul rnams //
T02D1750:135a-6: sku gsum rnam kyis rnam par gnas //
T02D1750:135a-7: stong nyid snying rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1750:135a-9: lha nyid rnam pa du ma ni //
T02D1750:135a-10: de nyid spangs pa min pa gang //
T02D1750:135a-11: thugs rjes mchog tu chags gyur pa //
T02D1750:135a-12: 'jig rten mgon ni rgyal bar byed //
T02D1750:135a-13: chos bdag med pa dam pa'i dngos //
T02D1750:135a-14: rmad byung mthar gnas pa gang de //
T02D1750:135a-15: du ma'i dkyil 'khor pa gang nyid //
T02D1750:135a-16: thugs rje chen po rnam par 'jog / phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi rgyu //
T02D1750:135a-17: padma dra ba dpal la brten //
T02D1750:135a-18: ji ltar bla mas nyer bstan pa //
T02D1750:135a-19: de yi sgrub thabs rim par brjod //
T02D1750:135a-20: ye shes shes rab thabs rang bzhin //
T02D1750:135a-21: sgrub thabs sems la kun phan pa //
T02D1750:135b-0: chig don phal cher rnam @135b gsal ba //
T02D1750:135b-1: bdag dang blo mnyam rnams la phan //
T02D1750:135b-2: dang po re zhig yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1750:135b-3: sems bskyed nas sems can gdon pa la kun du
T02D1750:135b-4: dmigs te lam sngon du bya'o //
T02D1750:135b-5: 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyid bdag gis 'khor ba'i
T02D1750:135b-6: sdug bsngal las bton nas sangs rgyas nyid la nges
T02D1750:135b-8: sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur sngags kyi theg pa
T02D1750:135b-9: chen po theg pa thams cad kyi mchog bla ma'i
T02D1750:135b-10: drin gyis nye bar bstan pa las yang dag par
T02D1750:135b-12: bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas ji ltar rig
T02D1750:135b-13: pa kun du spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa
T02D1750:135b-14: brtsam par bya'o // sngags kyi tshul chen po nyid
T02D1750:135b-15: gang las byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad kyi
T02D1750:135b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1750:135b-19: sangs rgyas lam gsum yang dag byung //
T02D1750:135b-20: yang dag gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas //
T02D1750:135b-21: ye shes mnyam med yang dag thob //
T02D1750:135b-23: de'i phyir sngags kyi tshul brjod pa bsgoms pa'i stobs
T02D1750:135b-24: las dus yun mi ring ba kho nas bsod nams
T02D1750:135b-25: dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas
T02D1750:135b-26: na / bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang thob par byed do //
T02D1750:135b-28: byams dang snying rje mnyam par sbyor las yid ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub las //
T02D1750:135b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shin tu zab pa'i tshul du'ang lhag par mos par ldan //
T02D1750:135b-30: sbyin pa tshul khrims la sogs kun rdzogs srid pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs //
T02D1750:135b-31: sems la sdug bsngal dang ni dub pa med par lha nyid mnyes par byed //
T02D1750:135b-40: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang ldan pa /
T02D1750:135b-41: tshogs par sbyor ba bla ma'i drin gyis byin zhing rjes su gnang ba /
T02D1750:135b-42: gnyug ma'i gsang sngags dngos su byas pa'i bsod nams
T02D1750:135b-43: dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa 'dzin la sogs par
T02D1750:135b-44: gang yang rung bar bde ba'i stan la sems dpa'i
T02D1750:135b-46: bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba'i don du //
T02D1750:136a-1: byed yud tsam gyis dran par bya'o //
T02D1750:136a-2: aom aa mri ta ha na ha na sarba bighnam da ha da ha sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D1750:136a-3: de nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam par sbyangs nas //
T02D1750:136a-4: byams pa la sogs pa bsgoms pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1750:136a-5: bas rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1750:136a-6: 'khor la hr'i:'i yi ge bsams nas nam mkha'i mthil
T02D1750:136a-7: du rdo rje til gyis gang bu bzhin du bar
T02D1750:136a-8: mtshams med par rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1750:136a-9: gyi 'khor lo dang de dang tha mi dad pa'i
T02D1750:136a-10: bla ma rnams kyi sku dang de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1750:136a-11: rnams kyis kyang yongs su gang bar kun du dmigs
T02D1750:136a-12: nas hr'i:'i yi ge de las gzugs dang sgra dang
T02D1750:136a-13: dri dang ro dang reg bya rdo rje'i lha mo
T02D1750:136a-14: dang phyi rol gyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me
T02D1750:136a-15: tog la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'i lha
T02D1750:136a-16: mo rnams spros nas yang dag par mched nas bdag
T02D1750:136a-17: nyid de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste gus pa
T02D1750:136a-18: dang dul ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas
T02D1750:136a-19: te / pus mo'i lha nga btsugs nas phyag 'tshal bar blta'o //
T02D1750:136a-20: 'di ltar sngar brjod gzugs sogs dang //
T02D1750:136a-21: de bzhin rin chen sogs phung pos //
T02D1750:136a-22: mchod pa rnam par brtag byas nas //
T02D1750:136a-23: sngags pas de rnams 'bad pas mchod //
T02D1750:136a-24: de ltar de rnams mdun 'du gnas //
T02D1750:136a-25: bus btsugs thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02D1750:136a-26: sdig pa la sogs mi dmigs pas //
T02D1750:136a-27: bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1750:136a-28: bdag gi sdig kun bshags par bgyi //
T02D1750:136a-29: dge la mchog dags rjes yi rang //
T02D1750:136a-30: ji srid 'gro gnas gang don du //
T02D1750:136a-31: bcom ldan dam chos rin chen dang //
T02D1750:136a-32: dkon mchog gsum la mngon par skyabs su mchi //
T02D1750:136a-33: byang chub yid la bzung zhing de yi lam //
T02D1750:136a-34: yang dag bsten zhing dge ba'i gter rnams ni //
T02D1750:136a-35: rdzogs pa'i byang chub ched du yang dag bsten //
T02D1750:136a-36: de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs so //
T02D1750:136a-37: zhes pa la sogs thams cad bklags nas so //

T02D1750:136b-35: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid bya //
T02D1750:136b-36: nam zhig sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing //

T02D1750:136b-45: re phyir thog ma dbus mtha' grol //

T02D1750:136b-50: / rdzogs pa yongs su 'jug pa ni //

T02D1750:136b-53: sna tshogs chu skyes rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa //

T02D1750:136b-55: de nas rlung me chu sa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1750:137a-1: gyur zla ba de la de'i //
T02D1750:137a-2: steng du zla bar pam yig ser po ni //
T02D1750:137a-3: yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs padma'o //
T02D1750:137a-4: de yi ze 'brur zla ba bhr'um yig las skyes pa'i 'khor lo /
T02D1750:137a-5: de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1750:137a-6: kyi rang gi ngo bo ye shes kyi mchod rten
T02D1750:137a-7: khang pa brtsegs pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1750:137a-9: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1750:137a-10: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang //
T02D1750:137a-11: dra ba dra phyed me tog phreng //
T02D1750:137a-12: me long la sogs pas brgyan pa //
T02D1750:137a-13: shin tu rnam par dag pa yi //
T02D1750:137a-14: chos kyi dbyings las skyes pa'i phyir //
T02D1750:137a-15: nyer spyod lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1750:137a-16: 'gro ba ma lus pa shin tu rnam dbyer med par brjod pa'i phyir //
T02D1750:137a-17: der gyur pa'i nyes pas rjes su gos pa med
T02D1750:137a-18: pa'i phyir sdong bu gcig la rim pa gsum 'dab
T02D1750:137a-19: ma sum cu rtsa drug pa'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan
T02D1750:137a-20: nye bar mdzes pa'i lha'i gnas sems can thams cad
T02D1750:137a-21: kyi nyon mongs pa'i kun du gdung ba zhi bar
T02D1750:137a-22: byed pa'i phyir dang dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar
T02D1750:137a-24: thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1750:137a-25: 'dab ma so sor zla ba'i gdan la rjes su
T02D1750:137a-26: son pa ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bzlog
T02D1750:137a-27: pa'i phyir dang / mi dge ba'i 'dab ma skems pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1750:137a-28: byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu smin par byed pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1750:137a-29: shes rab kyi rang bzhin can nyid kyi phyir sgo dang zur du nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
T02D1750:137a-30: thugs rjes brlan pa nyid kyi phyir dang bsod nams
T02D1750:137a-31: kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir bum
T02D1750:137a-32: pa gang ba rnams kyis yongs su brgyan pa'o //
T02D1750:137a-33: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis rin po che lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1750:137a-34: de bzhin du rang gi sems de rnam par dag par gyur pa /
T02D1750:137a-35: khang pa brtsegs pa'i rang bzhin khang pa ru //
T02D1750:137a-36: de la dbus su zla ba'i gdan la ni //
T02D1750:137a-37: bcu drug nyis 'gyur gyi ni dbyangs rnams kyi //
T02D1750:137a-38: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis tshogs pa yi //
T02D1750:137a-39: nus pas rdzogs par byed par blta bar bya //
T02D1750:137a-40: lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog pa yi //
T02D1750:137a-41: phreng ba gnyis su nges par gnas pa yis //
T02D1750:137a-42: dag pa zla ba shel gyi rnam pa yis //
T02D1750:137a-43: rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng rnams kyis //
T02D1750:137b-0: de nas ka la sogs @137b pa'i sum cu bzhi //
T02D1750:137b-1: de rnams da dha da dha ya la dang bcas
T02D1750:137b-2: pa rnams 'bad pa chung ba dang ldan pa nyid
T02D1750:137b-3: kyi phyir rab tu bcug nas bzhi bcur bya'o //
T02D1750:137b-4: de rnams kho na nyis 'gyur du bya ste /
T02D1750:137b-5: dpe byad brgyad cu po rnams so //
T02D1750:137b-6: de rnams las skyes pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
T02D1750:137b-8: sku yi byin rlabs la grub pa //
T02D1750:137b-10: da dha da dha la ya bdag / bcug nas nyis 'gyur ka sogs bya //
T02D1750:137b-11: de las kyang zla bsam byas nas //
T02D1750:137b-12: dpe byad sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1750:137b-13: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1750:137b-14: snying rje'i rtsa ba las byung drags //
T02D1750:137b-15: de'i phyir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1750:137b-16: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa /
T02D1750:137b-17: me long dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D1750:137b-19: bya ba rjes su sgrub pa dang /
T02D1750:137b-20: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D1750:137b-21: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin hr'i:'i yi ge'i sa bon
T02D1750:137b-22: yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid dpal padma spyan
T02D1750:137b-23: ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thub pa'i mchog rdul phra
T02D1750:137b-24: rab kyi lus tshad med pa dang /
T02D1750:137b-25: bsdus pa'i dngos po dang skad cig dang dga' ba
T02D1750:137b-26: bzhi rnam par dag pa yang dag par gsal bar
T02D1750:137b-27: byed pa'i zhal bzhi par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1750:137b-28: 'gro ba tshim par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir
T02D1750:137b-29: rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus gang ba'i zla ba ltar
T02D1750:137b-30: dkar ba / g-yas pa dang rgyab dang g-yon pa'i zhal sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
T02D1750:137b-31: sngags dang bdag dang lha'i de nyid gsum gsal bar
T02D1750:137b-32: byed pa po nyid kyi phyir spyan gsum rnam par
T02D1750:137b-33: thar pa brgyad kyi tshul gyi phyir phyag brgyad do
T02D1750:137b-34: // stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dag
T02D1750:137b-35: mnyam pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po'i phyir dang
T02D1750:137b-36: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dam pa'i sku
T02D1750:137b-37: gsal bar byed pa po nyid kyi phyir rnam pa
T02D1750:137b-38: gnyis sgron mas kun du snang mes byed pa ltar
T02D1750:137b-39: rang snang gi rig ma gos dkar mo g-yon gyi
T02D1750:137b-40: pang du phyag gis 'khyud de 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1750:137b-41: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1750:137b-42: ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'chad pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir skyil krung phyed pa'o //
T02D1750:138a-1: po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir dang /
T02D1750:138a-2: me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnam par
T02D1750:138a-3: dag pa'i phyir g-yas pa'i phyag dang por gnas pa'i
T02D1750:138a-4: rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rjes g-yon gyi phyag dang
T02D1750:138a-5: por gnas pa'i padma 'byed bzhin pa'o //
T02D1750:138a-6: ji ltar padma dmar po ni //
T02D1750:138a-7: gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D1750:138a-8: de bzhin grub pa'i rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1750:138a-9: gnas nyes sna tshogs kyis kyang ngo //
T02D1750:138a-10: de phyir padma zhes brjod do //
T02D1750:138a-11: gdul dka' ba 'gags par byed pa'i phyir padma'i lcags kyu gdengs pa'o //
T02D1750:138a-12: gdul bya ma yin pa 'ching bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir padma'i zhags pas mtshan pa'i phyag go //
T02D1750:138a-13: don dam pa las chos thams cad bdag med pa'o
T02D1750:138a-14: zhes gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ye shes kyi bdud
T02D1750:138a-15: rtsis gang ba'i thod pa phyag tu'o //
T02D1750:138a-16: skye mched drug la sogs pa'i lus 'jog pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1750:138a-17: mgo bo la sogs pa rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnam par dpyad pa las /
T02D1750:138a-18: stong pa nyid ro gcig cing dbye ba med pa'i mgo bo'o //
T02D1750:138a-19: g-yo ba med pa'i dngos po'i phyir dag pa'i shel
T02D1750:138a-20: dang dung dang kunda dang zla ba ltar dkar ba'i
T02D1750:138a-21: kha tv'am ga bsnams pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyir
T02D1750:138a-23: spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid dang
T02D1750:138a-24: bcas pa nyid kyis lha mo'i nu ma la reg
T02D1750:138a-25: cing dga' ba'o // sdug bsngal gsum gyis gzir ba'i
T02D1750:138a-26: 'gro ba la so sor rtog pa'i mchog nyid kyi
T02D1750:138a-27: phyir 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can no //
T02D1750:138a-28: bcud len yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dang ye shes
T02D1750:138a-29: kyi zla ba'i cha'i myu gu can gyi ral pa'i
T02D1750:138a-30: tshogs kyis brgyan pa de kho na nyid kyi cha
T02D1750:138a-31: shas bsdus par bcas pa rnam par 'joms pa po
T02D1750:138a-32: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir padma dkar pos dbu
T02D1750:138a-33: la mtshan pa'o // de bzhin du /
